alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 12:12PM EDT until March 19 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Paducah Ohio River at Golconda Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam Ohio River at Shawneetown ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Cairo Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam Ohio River at Mount Vernon .The lower Ohio River is falling at most locations, though this will occur slower below Mount Vernon Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 44.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Friday evening and continue falling to 29.3 feet Friday, March 25. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
